description: It is time we take decisive steps toward a more compassionate and public health-centered approach to drug policy.

title: Inflation slowed to 3 percent in June, hits lowest rate in two years
description: Consumer prices rose 3 percent annually in June and 0.2 percent last month alone, according to inflation data released Wednesday by the Labor Department.
